nodes.text: The Ringlite system was a star system situated in the Outer Rim Territories. During the High Republic Era, the system was hit by one of the Emergences of the Great Hyperspace Disaster, leaving several thousand people dead. Further damage was only averted by the valiant efforts of the system's security squads, and the tragedy led Supreme Chancellor Lina Soh to further extend her hyperspace cordon which banned most travel.
